original_text: and the priest shall examine him, and if the disease has turned white, then the priest shall pronounce the diseased person clean; he is clean.
korean_text: 제사장은 그를 진찰하여서 그 환부가 희어졌으면 환자를 정하다 할지니 그는 정하니라

sentences.original_text: and the priest shall examine him
and if the disease has turned white
then the priest shall pronounce the diseased person clean
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 그 병자를 깨끗하다고 선언할 것입니다
